actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to remove certain limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the U.S. section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.

summary.text: Removes the appropriation limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the United States section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the U.S. section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.
